name: Pack Smart & Light
description:
Stick to essentials and use packing cubes.
Roll clothes to save space.
Always pack a small first-aid kit and necessary medications.

name: Plan But Stay Flexible
description:
Book major things (flights, accommodation) in advance but leave room for spontaneous experiences.
Check local holidays & festivals that might affect your plans.

name: Stay Connected & Safe
description:
Download offline maps in case of no internet.
Keep copies of important documents in email or cloud storage. Use a VPN when connecting to public Wi-Fi.

name: Respect Local Culture & Customs
description:
Learn a few basic phrases in the local language.
Dress appropriately in religious or cultural sites. Research local tipping etiquette.

name: Budget Wisely & Avoid Scams
description:
Use travel credit cards with no foreign transaction fees.
Check official taxi fares or use rideshare apps. Be aware of common tourist scams.
